amendment.description: An amendment comprised of the following amendments printed in Part D of House Report 117-110 as en bloc 3: Nos. 5, 6, 7, 9, 10, 18, 25, 26, 28, 30, and 31.
amendment.purpose: Amendments en bloc No. 3 comprised of amendments numbered 6, 7, 9, 10, 18, 25, 26, 28, 30, and 31 printed in Part D of House Report 117-110.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Lee (CA) amendments (A004) Agreed to by the Yeas and Nays: 217 - 200 (Roll no. 241).

action.text: The previous question was ordered on the amendment (A004) pursuant to the rule.
